metadata.title: CVE-2024-26581 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_set_rbtree: skip end interval element from gc rbtree lazy gcon insert might collect an end interval element that has been just added inthis transactions, skip end interval elements that are not yet active.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
